goal.en: 學習工程結構分析的基本原理與計算方法，為瞭解工程結構受載行為的入門課程，亦是未來從事結構工程設計必備的基本學科之一。學生學習工程結構分析模型基本假設、分析原理與計算方法，並瞭解工程結構受力後的行為。
goal.ch: 學習工程結構分析的基本原理與計算方法，為瞭解工程結構受載行為的入門課程，亦是未來從事結構工程設計必備的基本學科之一。學生學習工程結構分析模型基本假設、分析原理與計算方法，並瞭解工程結構受力後的行為。

content.en:
1. Types of Structures and Loads
2. Analysis of Statically Determinate Structures
3. Analysis of Statically Determinate Trusses
4. Internal Loadings Developed in Structural Members
5. Deflections
6. Deflections Using Energy Methods
7. Analysis of Statically Indeterminate Structures by the Force Method
8. Influence Lines for Statically Determinate Structures
content.ch:
1. Types of Structures and Loads
2. Analysis of Statically Determinate Structures
3. Analysis of Statically Determinate Trusses
4. Internal Loadings Developed in Structural Members
5. Deflections
6. Deflections Using Energy Methods
7. Analysis of Statically Indeterminate Structures by the Force Method
8. Influence Lines for Statically Determinate Structures

textbook.en: Structural Analysis by R.C. Hibbeler (9th Ed., SI Units)
textbook.ch: "R.C. Hibbeler, ""Structural Analysis (9th Ed., SI Units)"" Pearson"

grading.en: Exam:80% Homework:10% Roll call and quiz:10%
grading.ch: Exam:80% Homework:10% Roll call and quiz:10%

flex_desc.en: These two weeks of flexible teaching schedule will be conducted in the form of project or remedial teaching and other learning methods.
flex_desc.ch: 彈性教學將以專題或補救教學等學習方式進行。

domain.en: 專業基礎學科 、 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程
domain.ch: 專業基礎學科 、 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public
